reviewText:
Obviously, the story is very interesting and many people may know about it.
I think the most attractive part is the sound from the reader Mr. John Lone.
The sound is perfect, making the whole story touching and moving.
I like the sound more than the story.
Definitely I will buy this story and the video.
This just reminds me of my childhood, story time at the library or being able to pick out my own movies to borrow on my own library card.
I loved this book as a child. Well done.
A Classic Chinese story with slight animation, and great narration!
It's a good story. Not the same story I learned in grammar school and the carator speaks slow and softly enough to put listeners to sleep. This is not the story I expected.
Childhood story now available to watch!
A great family movie. A good story before bedtime. I like that the story is told with still pictures. That's my imagination create the story rather than watching it on the screen.
When I found this to watch I showed my kids and they liked it just like the book I was surprised

Not like I remember the story from my childhood school days, but then again my memory not splendid.
I much preferred the Just So stories told by Jack Nicholson.

i liked it... but i just can't give it 5 stars :(
it is not the true story i expected, and at times the music is so much louder than the voice that it's distracting.
Worth your time, but not worth a purchase (i got it free with Prime!)
